Html: I'm sorry to say...I can't say at this time.  We're working hard on the next release and it is absolutely huge compared to the February release but is taking way longer than expected.  :(  We're starting to get stable though with the code that is checked into source control if you'd like to take a look where we're headed.  Thanks for your patience!

Haven't we all?  :(  :P  :)

You can take the latest checkins and run them.  They're stable enough to start at least trying out.  We're still finishing out some features.  But trust...it'll be worth the wait.  :)
Yes, I take the latest checkins everyday .
Cool, so you're familiar with what's done and what's not then, huh?  ;)
